page.title: 09Communications/Postal
page.content: Postmen are generally highly respected.This is well earned as the Larbert office operates a medical prescription service for mature citizens since the closing of the only chemist's shop in Larbert.As nation wide,local residents are loathe to use their{postal code}.When asked,several people did not know that they had them.Some of the public complained that their{postal address}was Falkirk,and all their mail had to be delivered from there.That is purely because of their house location,and has little to do with the fact that they are nearer to Larbert. Stenhousemuir hes not got a delivery office. One local resident complained that his letters, if 1st class,go out from Larbert that day. If 2nd class are delivered via falkirk in 3 days.
